bibl.title: Magic in the Ancient Greek World. (Blackwell Ancient Religions.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Magic: What Is It and How Does It Work? - 2. A Framework for Greek Magic. - 3. Binding Magic and Erotic Figurines. - 4. Homeric Incantations. - 5. Magic in Greek and Roman Law. - 6. Conclusion. - Bibliography. Index. - Uses the evidence of Greek magical papyri.
bibl.seg: COLLINS Derek, Magic in the Ancient Greek World. (Blackwell Ancient Religions.)

Introduction. - 1. Magic: What Is It and How Does It Work? - 2. A Framework for Greek Magic. - 3. Binding Magic and Erotic Figurines. - 4. Homeric Incantations. - 5. Magic in Greek and Roman Law. - 6. Conclusion. - Bibliography. Index. - Uses the evidence of Greek magical papyri.
C.R. par Werner Riess, CW 103 (2009-2010) pp. 271-273.
